long_description: If you prefer to keep your hands free and shoulders comfortable, the REI Ashbury urban-style daypack offers a comfortable, balanced carry on your back. Main compartment has a padded interior sleeve that fits an iPad, small tablets and most e-readers; it's also sized to carry letter-size documents and magazines. Panel-style zipper opening provides easy access to contents. Lightly padded back panel and shoulder straps are shaped to keep you comfortable without extra bulk; includes a carry handle. Quick-access front pocket has an organizer panel with pen and phone slots, a zip mesh pocket and a key clip. Quick-access back zip pocket; side pockets expand to hold small water bottle or umbrella. Wheeled luggage pass-through slot provides extra carrying convenience when traveling. REI Ashbury daypack is made of partially recycled, post-consumer fabric which holds up well against urban elements.
short_description: If you prefer to keep your hands free and shoulders comfortable, the REI Ashbury urban-style daypack offers a comfortable, balanced carry on your back.
